title: Anwar and wife to attend MCA open house
desc: KUALA LUMPUR: Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim and his wife Datin Seri Dr Wan Azizah Wan Ismail are expected to attend MCA's Chinese New Year open house here on Feb 17.

title: The Sky Today on Saturday, February 7: Ganymede disappears
desc: Jupiter’s largest moon, Ganymede, passes behind the planet’s disk in an occultation tonight. Watch the satellite slowly disappear from view.
